articles.author: Keith Collantine
articles.title: Transcript: How Red Bull handled Perez and Verstappen's Jeddah scrap - RaceFans
articles.description: Sergio Perez wants Red Bull to review their communications to him and Max Verstappen in Jeddah. Here's what they said.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen wasn’t able to chase down his team mate Sergio Perez for victory in the second half of the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
However Verstappen made sure he came away with the bonus point for… [+14849 chars]

articles.author: Dayne Fox
articles.title: UFC 286: Leon Edwards vs. Kamaru Usman 3 - Unofficial Awards - Bloody Elbow
articles.description: Get a unique rundown of all the trophies that should have been handed out at UFC 286 with Dayne Fox’s Unofficial Awards.
articles.content: MMA is an interesting sport. Theres fights where you know exactly what youre going to get. Sometimes thats exactly what you hope for, other times youre begging for a rabbit to be pulled out of a hat.… [+13228 chars]
